Title: Establishes the crime of voter intimidation or harassment
Summary: Establishes the crime of voter intimidation or harassment and prohibits persons who have been convicted of such crime from registering for or voting at an election.
LawCode: Add ยง240.78, Pen L; amd ยง5-106, El L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law and the election law, in relation to establishing the crime of voter intimidation or harassment
